solution_line_template: The injury would be fully healed after {pain_subsided_days}*{healing_multiplier}=<<{pain_subsided_days}*{healing_multiplier}={healing_days}>>{healing_days} days
So he would start exercising again in {healing_days}+{wait_before_exercising}=<<{healing_days}+{wait_before_exercising}={days_to_start_exercising}>>{days_to_start_exercising} days

He would then wait for {wait_weeks_for_lifting}*{days_per_week}=<<{wait_weeks_for_lifting}*{days_per_week}={days_to_wait_for_lifting}>>{days_to_wait_for_lifting} more days to start lifting heavy again
That means he needs to wait {days_to_start_exercising}+{days_to_wait_for_lifting}=<<{days_to_start_exercising}+{days_to_wait_for_lifting}={total_wait_days}>>{total_wait_days} days
